contentrichtext.text: The following are lists of people who play '''[[association football]]''' (soccer). {{Football (soccer) players}} == Other lists of players == * [[List of footballers with 100 or more caps]] * [[Top international association football goal scorers by country]] * [[List of current MLS players]] * [[List of foreign MLS players]] * [[List of foreign footballers in the Iranian Premier League]] * [[List of foreign Serie A players]] * [[List of foreign footballers in Japan]] * [[Retired numbers in association football]] * [[List of football players with a Premier League winner's medal]] * [[List of association football families of note]] * [[Dual Irish international footballers]] * [[List of goalscoring goalkeepers]] * [[List of Yugoslavia international footballers]] == See also == * [[List of people]] * [[List of people by occupation]] * [[List of American football players]] * [[List of Australian Rules footballers]] * [[List of footballers (Gaelic football)]] [[Category:Lists of lists|Association football players]] [[Category:Lists of association football players| ]]
